metadata.synopsis: A banter PAD when taking the elevator down to the Ketheric Showdown from the upper floor of the Colony. If there are two tadpoled players available, they will banter together, otherwise a solo PAD will play.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony elevator near 744 14 -22 or S_COL_NearElevator_Up_a32a3736-abc5-4303-82cd-62fe2ac06008- Take the elevator down with one or multiple companions.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Is anyone else's tadpole squirming around a lot more than usual?

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Aye. Feels like something down here has them excited... or scared.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: My tadpole's squirming like it's excited... or scared.
